Desc.entry: Aims to raise children's awareness of local wildlife and the environment. Activities include fun, games, craft work and outdoor activities. Children aged under 8 years need to be supervised by a responsible adult. Holds Annual Wildlife Watch day trip in June and Christmas party in December.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Usually 2nd Sat in the month 10am-12noon, please telephone as venue changes with trips etc

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
